member.name: T:Shorthand.Geodesy.GaussKruger
member.summary: Implementation of the Gauss-Kr√ºger formula for converting between geodetic coordinates and grid coordinates.

member.name: M:Shorthand.Geodesy.GaussKruger.GeodeticToGrid(Shorthand.Geodesy.GeodeticCoordinate,Shorthand.Geodesy.Projections.Projection)
member.summary: Converts a geodetic coordinate to a grid coordinate.
member.param: The projection to use in the conversion.
member.returns: The grid representation of the initial coordinate.

member.name: M:Shorthand.Geodesy.GaussKruger.GridToGeodetic(Shorthand.Geodesy.GridCoordinate)
member.summary: Converts a grid coordinate to a geodetic coordinate.
member.returns: The geodetic representation of the initial coordinate.

member.name: T:Shorthand.Geodesy.GridCoordinate
member.summary: Represents a coordinate projected on a grid

member.name: T:Shorthand.Geodesy.DistanceCalculator
member.summary: Helper methods to calculate distances between coordinates.

member.name: M:Shorthand.Geodesy.DistanceCalculator.Haversine(Shorthand.Geodesy.GeodeticCoordinate,Shorthand.Geodesy.GeodeticCoordinate)
member.summary: Calculates the distance between two geodetic coordinates using the Haversine formula.
member.returns: The distance between the coordinates in kilometers.

member.name: M:Shorthand.Geodesy.DistanceCalculator.Spherical(Shorthand.Geodesy.GeodeticCoordinate,Shorthand.Geodesy.GeodeticCoordinate)
member.summary: Calculates the distance between two geodetic coordinates using the Spherical law of cosines.
member.returns: The distance between the coordinates in kilometers.

member.name: M:Shorthand.Geodesy.DistanceCalculator.CoordFromDistance(Shorthand.Geodesy.GeodeticCoordinate,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates a new coordinate from a bearing and distance from a specified coordinate.
member.param: The bearing from the initial coordinate in degrees.
The distance from the initial coordinate in kilometers.
member.returns: A new geodetic coordinate representing the new point.
